Description: Installation divided into 28 plots, each with a 30- by 50-meter treatment area and a 20- by 40-meter interior measurement plot.
Arbitrary number given to soil sample.
Amount of sand particles found in soil sample.  Analyzed by Oregon State University (OSU)
Amount of silt particles found in soil sample.  Analyzed by Oregon State University (OSU)
Amount of clay particles found in soil sample.  Analyzed by Oregon State University (OSU)
Texture names given to soils based upon the relative proportion of each of the three soil separates (sand, silt and clay)
